answers.answer: I failed my 1 hour test but passed the 3 hour one.  It's just really long and boring.  Same Concept,  time just drags. Bring lots of things to keep you busy!
Yep pretty much ^ just longer and the drinks just a lil sweeter only thing worst about it is they take your blood four times instead of twice

They of drew blood once on me, they got 2 tube though. It's just scary :/ I'm praying it's not gestational diabetes. They haven't called me or anything to know when to go do the 3 hour one so I'm just waiting .. agh !
They only took my blood twice, take a book!

question: I'm 27 weeks! And I failed my 1 hour glucose test yesterday with a 184, they're recommending for me to take the 3 hour test now. I'm so scared! Has anyone else experienced this??? :( if so how was your 3 hour test ??
title: glucose testing
